text: (muhminkale!) Arirtu kollunkal;. Ninkal avarkalai necipporay irukkinrirkal - anal avarkal unkalai necikkavillai. Ninkal vetattai mulumaiyaka nampukirirkal;. Anal avarkalo unkalaic cantikkum potu"nankalum nampukirom" enru kurukirarkal;. Eninum avarkal (unkalai vittu vilakit) taniyaka irukkum potu, avarkal unkal melulla attirattinal (tam) viral nunikalaik katittukkolkirarkal. (Napiye!) Nir kurum; "ninkal unkal attirattil irantu vitunkal;. Niccayamaka allah (unkal) ullankalil ullavarrai arintavan
